sentences.sContent: I represent all of the children to guarantee : we 'll study hard to requite you !
sentences.sContent_eng: I represent all of the children to guarantee : we 'll study hard to requite you !
sentences.sCn: 我代表所有的孩子们保证：我们会努力学习来报答您！

sentences.sContent: But if any widow have children or nephews , let them learn first to shew piety at home , and to requite their parents: for that is good and acceptable before God .
sentences.sContent_eng: But if any widow have children or nephews , let them learn first to shew piety at home , and to requite their parents: for that is good and acceptable before God .
sentences.sCn: 若寡妇有儿女，或有孙子孙女，便叫他们先在自己家中学着行孝，报答亲恩，因为这在神面前是可悦纳的。

remMethod.val: re + quit (免除) + e → 免除农业税， 报答老百姓 → 报答

trans.tranOther: to give or do something in return for something done or given to you
